Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.sdn.example.policies

Class VmAllocationPolicyCombinedLeastFullFirst

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.sdn.example.policies.VmAllocationPolicyCombinedMostFullFirst
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.sdn.example.policies.VmAllocationPolicyCombinedLeastFullFirst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PowerUtilizationMaxHostInterface
    public class VmAllocationPolicyCombinedLeastFullFirst
extends VmAllocationPolicyCombinedMostFullFirst
    VM Allocation Policy - BW and Compute combined, LFF. When select a host to create a new VM, this policy chooses the least full host in terms of both compute power and network bandwidth.
    Since:
    CloudSimSDN 1.0
    Author:
    Jungmin Son
